thread.title: ToysRUs Beauty & The Beast Launch Party: Build FREE Disney Character (March 25th)
thread.title_full: ToysRUs Beauty & The Beast Launch Party: Build FREE Disney Character (March 25th)

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: ToysRUs Beauty & The Beast Launch Party: Build FREE Disney Character (March 25th)
text:
This free event is tomorrow – don’t forget! Tomorrow, March 25th from 1PM-3PM only, participating ToysRUs locations will be hosting a LEGO Beauty and the Beast Movie Launch Party where kids ages 6 and up will be able to make and take home a FREE Disney Lumiere Character ! Go here for more information. 

And make note of these upcoming events! Mega Construx/American Girl Event : On April 1st from 1-3PM, kids can come into ALL ToysRUs locations to build and keep a FREE American Girl Lea’s Beach Chair OR a UNSC Wasp Aircraft!
Easter with Geoffrey Event : On April 9th from 1-3PM, kids’ can come into ALL ToysRUs locations to participate in an Easter Egg Hunt, win prizes, join Geoffrey for a parade and more!
